channel.title: [317] ImmunityRSPS | 24/7 | PK/PVM | GOOD ECO | COMMUNITY | 24/7 [ LOADS 474]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://immunityrs.com/logo.png[/img]
[IMG]http://diverity.net/Themes/default/images/PlayNow.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://immunityrs.com"]Website![/URL] [IMG]http://diverity.net/Themes/default/images/PlayNow.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.immunityrs.com/immunity.jar"]Download client![/URL] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pEk8h.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.immunityrs.com/forum"]Join the forums![/URL] [IMG]http://diverity.net/Themes/RedFox/images/devteam.gif[/img][URL=http://"http://immunityrs.com/forum/showthread.php?tid=16"]View update log[/URL]
[B]Introduction[/B] Welcome to Immunity RSPS here we aim to redefine the words "Player killing". Join us today to start your most revelutionary adventure to date! To play simply press Play now above and press the download link on the landing page to join us today!
[B]Home[/B] We believe a tidy home is a happy home so we've kept it clutter free! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/t9F6zuF.png[/img]
[CENTER][B]Bosses[/B]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/e806839628de573e93590545576ffa9e.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/dacaa35f37674b96c68ea7368f9a6dee.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/60290e00d462fa79518e7a2ef6717633.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/0f802de6d4412383d591a7f5510de0b7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/c2ba8f321a7dce72ad81f614b02931e9.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B]Skill Points[/B] Hate training certain skills? That's okay we've added skill points which are gained by training all skills and then can be redeemed for XP at your skill point master. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/m0aDr6J.png[/img]
[B][CENTER]Duo slayer[/CENTER][/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/8724cf9ad27b2e474e0484a6b9b7aad3.png[/img]
[B]PvM[/B] Those other monsters becoming a bore? We've added new monsters with all new drops so your PvM'ing never runs dry.[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/1be38074a9687e79315f583b90b50808.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][CENTER]PvP[/CENTER][/B] [CENTER]Predominently we are a PK based server, so were constantly updating your wilderness content so it never becomes a chore. [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/2293317096f08c3603498eaf1dfc81e8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/c7d41fc173c188e479a562acfd5d0304.png[/img]
[B]Creation skill[/B] We've come up with a new skill. The creation skill. When you get a plan as a drop, you'll be able to make a weapon with that plan. How high the skill, the better weapons you can create. Here are some plans.. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vPRBTaF.png[/img]
[B]Skilling[/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/35b40e07ed29c67f72c21de83788d318.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/daf9dab48db82fcfffe681002143e509.png[/img] [/CENTER] [B][CENTER]Money Making[/CENTER][/B] [CENTER]You can get tasks. These tasks will get you some money when completed. Don't worry, they aren't hard and are worth the time! A good way to get money when you love skilling! [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/c6792358ead24c49d92ebca465428fe2.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][CENTER]Minigames[/CENTER][/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/ba39c330cf204e882af2dd23985dce34.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/6f02d4aeaab0d45104aee7d57d083aa9.png[/img]
[B][CENTER]Coloured completionist capes[/CENTER][/B] [CENTER]Don't like Red? Don't worry we have other colors for your enjoyment. [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/83ed6b6f1b8c38d96056b4510c7e43cc.png[/img][IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/bfa851da241e1b825aae3b949fd6ebb2.png[/img][IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/64f690cf2b90d000d5b3af8cca245667.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][CENTER]Voting rewards[/CENTER][/B] [CENTER]Don't want to spend alot of money with donating? And you want the full benefits that a bronze donator has? You can basically get it for ever, without even spending a penny! [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/61269ff34e0918c3f6f24042b112eb18.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bnT8V4x.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][CENTER]Prestige system[/CENTER][/B] [CENTER]Want to make some money, pk-ing points and squeal of fortune tickets? Then you can try our Prestige System. You only have to max out your combat skills. There are actually 250 prestiges. The points you get is: prestige * 1! How awesome is that? [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/267ec324f9ae5960ea3dfb27d2863c4d.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][CENTER]Godwars[/CENTER][/B] [CENTER]You'll have to gather some friends to slay the bosses in Godwars. Saradomin, Armadyl, Bandos & Zamorak [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/27922dd8eb93791de1f08b045524e91f.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/8f5810335fbdb1a30e97622c81aefc40.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][CENTER]New items[/CENTER][/B] [CENTER]We do have some items new, some are from Runescape 2007, others are from RS3, but don't worry. The items from RS3 can't be used in PKing. [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/a452002718ff885275dce7872fa4bc54.png[/img]
[URL=http://info.flagcounter.com/N8nk][IMG]http://s09.flagcounter.com/count/N8nk/bg_FFFFFF/txt_000000/border_CCCCCC/columns_5/maxflags_80/viewers_0/labels_0/pageviews_0/flags_0/[/img][/URL][/CENTER]

item.title: [317] ImmunityRSPS | 24/7 | PK/PVM | GOOD ECO | COMMUNITY | 24/7 [ LOADS 474]
item.dc:creator: @ImmunityRSPS ImmunityRSPS
item.description:
@ImmunityRSPS wrote:

[CENTER]

[URL=http://“http://immunityrs.com”]Website![/URL]
[URL=http://“http://www.immunityrs.com/immunity.jar”]Download client![/URL]
[URL=http://“http://www.immunityrs.com/forum”]Join the forums![/URL]
[URL=http://“http://immunityrs.com/forum/showthread.php?tid=16”]View update log[/URL]

[B]Introduction[/B]
Welcome to Immunity RSPS here we aim to redefine the words “Player killing”. Join us today to start your most revelutionary adventure to date! To play simply press Play now above and press the download link on the landing page to join us today!

[B]Home[/B]
We believe a tidy home is a happy home so we’ve kept it clutter free!

[CENTER][B]Bosses[/B]

[/CENTER]

[B]Skill Points[/B]
Hate training certain skills? That’s okay we’ve added skill points which are gained by training all skills and then can be redeemed for XP at your skill point master.

[B][CENTER]Duo slayer[/CENTER][/B]

[B]PvM[/B]
Those other monsters becoming a bore? We’ve added new monsters with all new drops so your PvM’ing never runs dry.[/CENTER]

[B][CENTER]PvP[/CENTER][/B]
[CENTER]Predominently we are a PK based server, so were constantly updating your wilderness content so it never becomes a chore.

[B]Creation skill[/B]
We’ve come up with a new skill. The creation skill. When you get a plan as a drop, you’ll be able to make a weapon with that plan. How high the skill, the better weapons you can create. Here are some plans…

[B]Skilling[/B]


[/CENTER]
[B][CENTER]Money Making[/CENTER][/B]
[CENTER]You can get tasks. These tasks will get you some money when completed. Don’t worry, they aren’t hard and are worth the time! A good way to get money when you love skilling!
[/CENTER]

[B][CENTER]Minigames[/CENTER][/B]

[B][CENTER]Coloured completionist capes[/CENTER][/B]
[CENTER]Don’t like Red? Don’t worry we have other colors for your enjoyment.
[/CENTER]

[B][CENTER]Voting rewards[/CENTER][/B]
[CENTER]Don’t want to spend alot of money with donating? And you want the full benefits that a bronze donator has? You can basically get it for ever, without even spending a penny!

[/CENTER]

[B][CENTER]Prestige system[/CENTER][/B]
[CENTER]Want to make some money, pk-ing points and squeal of fortune tickets? Then you can try our Prestige System. You only have to max out your combat skills. There are actually 250 prestiges. The points you get is: prestige * 1! How awesome is that?
[/CENTER]

[B][CENTER]Godwars[/CENTER][/B]
[CENTER]You’ll have to gather some friends to slay the bosses in Godwars. Saradomin, Armadyl, Bandos & Zamorak

[/CENTER]

[B][CENTER]New items[/CENTER][/B]
[CENTER]We do have some items new, some are from Runescape 2007, others are from RS3, but don’t worry. The items from RS3 can’t be used in PKing.

[URL=http://info.flagcounter.com/N8nk][/URL][/CENTER]
